item.description:
Eight To The Bar
Halloween Pizza Party,
October 28th, 6-11pm

Halloween Costume Pizza Party!

6pm Beginner Friendly Group Swing Dance Lesson
7pm Swingin' Halloween Costume Pizza Party with Eight To The Bar!

Prizes for best costumes!

Admission: $12.00 pp
6pm Beginner Friendly Group
Swing Dance Lesson

7pm Swing Dance
The Leominster Elk
134 N. Main Street
Leominster, MA
978) 534-8737

Leominster Lodge of Elks
134 North Main Street, (Route 12), Leominster, MA
From Route 2, either West or East, take Exit 31A. That will put you on North Main
Street which is Route 12 going South. Go through 2 sets of lights. After the 2nd set
of lights you'll see The Leominster Hospital on your right. You'll come to your 3rd set
of lights, go through the light staying on Route 12 South. The Elks will be on your
right hand side. It's a white building, set off the road. For more detailed directions go
to The Elks website at: www.leominsterelks.com.
item.name: Swingin' Halloween Costume Pizza Party with Eight To The Bar
